full_text: Halifax F For Freddie was named #Fridaythe13th after a series of losses, all carrying call sign F For Freddie. Aircrew were superstitious, so to kill the myth of bad luck, the next replacement was named Friday the 13th, carried an inverted horseshoe and a grim reaper symbol
